title.narrative: Cabo Verde Education and Skills Development Enhancement Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to strengthen foundational skills in education and improve the relevance of training programs to the recipient’s strategic development plan.

condition.narrative: The Recipient shall no later than three (3) months after the Effective Date have appointed a dedicated accountant at the UGPEsatisfactory to the Association.[Financing Agreement, Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, Paragraph 1 (b)].

The Recipient shall no later than three (3) months after the Effective Date have installed and customized a computerized accountingsoftware, satisfactory to the Association.[Financing Agreement, Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, Paragraph 1 (a)].

The Recipient shall no later than three (3) months after the Effective Date sign an agreement with an external auditor and anindependent verification agent, under terms and substance satisfactory to the Association, for purposes of Section II.B.1 ofSchedule 2 of the Financial Agreement.[Financing Agreement, Article V, Paragraph 5.01 (c)].

title.narrative: Teaching materials for grades 1-8 in Math, Portuguese, Science and Teaching materials for Foreign Languages for grades 5-8 developed and distributed, as per the new curriculum

baseline.value: Material for grades 1 and 5 available in the 22 delegations

target.value: Material for grades 1 to 8 available in the 22 delegations

actual.value: Materials for grades 1-8 are available in the 22 delegations
